body:
Tried connecting just now, said 

Unknown Host.

I tried re-entering ip, same thing.

Help?

title: Can't connect?

replies.body: Try a direct join to a game i.e.: Nebula1 and make sure the ip is correct
replies.body_tagged: Try a direct join to a game i.e.: Nebula1 and make sure the ip is correct

replies.body: ok thx it works now. sorry :0
